synopsis.text: Prime Video's acquisition of the struggling TV station, TV Na Na Na, has put the jobs of many at risk, especially those in departments with low ratings. The Expedition Team, once celebrated for capturing the elusive Kiina on film, finds themselves in the crosshairs of the impending layoffs. Desperate to save their jobs, the team, consisting of director Nanaoka, cameraman Nanamori, and assistant director Nanayama, embarks on a daring mission: to locate the long-lost treasure of the wealthy Banakawa Family from the Edo period. This treasure, hidden deep within a cave, has eluded even the most well-funded TV networks, making it a high-stakes, high-reward endeavor. Will the team's ambitious quest be enough to secure their jobs and boost the station's ratings? Tune in to find out as they broadcast their treasure hunt live on TV!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
